From the newsgroup,

get a NullPointerException when clicking on Finish, here is the stack trace:

Cherie, take a look at this one.
It could have been fixed as as side effect of bug 82265.

This bug is similar to but not fixed by bug 82265.  From the looks of it, we are
assuming there is a suggested schema container (i.e. plug-in project) when the
new schema wizard is invoked.  If the user clicks on "Finish" without typing
into any field, we may attempt to create the schema into a 'null' container.  As
a solution, I added an initial validation call on the wizard to disable the
"Finish"  in such situations.

Fixed and released to head :)

Thanks C.
and thanks to Olivier for reporting it.  I suspect he got it off the 
newsgroup, as I don't see him creating schemas every day.
